exercise.instructions: Referring to the list on your screen, choose the top five risks that your team would take and add them to the “Top 5 Risks” column on the right:

items.item: Private equity funded, high pressure to perform
Targeted to treat a population that includes minor children
Small number of patients could raise pressure to expand beyond approved indication
Significant safety signals may raise product liability
Pressure from advocacy groups (parents of patients)
General Counsel has no pharma/regulatory/commercialization experience
No compliance program thus far (likely means no organized training programs, no Code of conduct, no hotline, etc.)
Lack of pharma experience by executives
